Uses of Interface
org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2.AccessToken

  • Packages that use AccessToken 
    Package Description
    org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2
    This package contains the OAuth2 Token validation filter that acts as an OAuth 2 Resource Server.
    org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2.cache
    This package contains classes used to implement an AccessToken cache.
    org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2.resolver
    This package defines OpenAM specific logic needed to retrieve an .AccessToken.

    • Uses of AccessToken in org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2

      Methods in org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2 that return AccessToken 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccessToken AccessTokenResolver.resolve(String token)
      Resolves a given access token against a authorization server.

    • Uses of AccessToken in org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2.cache

      Methods in org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2.cache that return AccessToken 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccessToken CachingAccessTokenResolver.resolve(String token) 
      Constructor parameters in org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2.cache with type arguments of type AccessToken 
      Constructor and Description
      CachingAccessTokenResolver(AccessTokenResolver resolver, ThreadSafeCache<String,AccessToken> cache)
      Builds a CachingAccessTokenResolver delegating to the given AccessTokenResolver using the given (pre-configured) cache.

    • Uses of AccessToken in org.forgerock.openig.filter.oauth2.resolver

      class  OpenAmAccessToken
